column4: Does anyone have instructions for installing the liveCD onto a thumb drive? I need to add ubuntu to a PC that does not have a CD drive.
Does anyone have instructions for installing the liveCD onto a thumb drive? I need to add ubuntu to a PC that does not have a CD drive.
I've found UNetBootin to be very good for that
http://unetbootin.sourceforge.net/ for UNetBootin, if you want it
